verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Furahi ee Yerusalemu,
furahi na tena.
(Mshangilieni nyinyi
nyote mmpendao
Nyinyi mliao kwa ajili yake). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mpate kushiba na kunyonya,
kushibishwa maziwa,
na maziwa ya faraja
faraja zake Kristu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Furahieni fadhili zake,
fadhili zake Mumba wetu,
kwa ajili ya faraja
faraja zake Kristu.
